00014 void uiOptions::displayUIOptions(const GLuint & tempImage)
00015 {
00016         //finding centre of screen
00017         int wc = width / 2; 
00018         int hc = height / 2;
00019         int d = 300; // half of width and height of UI screen
00020 
00021         glPushMatrix();
00022         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00023         glPushMatrix();
00024         glLoadIdentity();
00025         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00026         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00027         glLoadIdentity();
00028         
00029         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00030         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00031         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING); 
00032         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00033         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00034 
00035         // display menu image at screen centre
00036         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage); 
00037         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00038                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00039                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc + d);
00040                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00041                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc - d);
00042                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00043                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc - d);
00044                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00045                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc + d);
00046         glEnd();
00047 
00048         string Level = to_string(gVar.LevelNum);
00049         string BallCount = to_string(gVar.ballCount);
00050         //cout << gVar.LevelNum << " " << a << endl;
00051 
00052         //data will need to be converted to string in order to put on screen
00053         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); //sets active to none
00054         glColor3f(0.498f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00055         glRasterPos2i(wc + 27, hc - 5);
00056         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)Level.c_str()); // need to replace with numPlanets
00057         glRasterPos2i(wc + 27, hc - 79);
00058         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)BallCount.c_str()); // need to replace with numProj
00059         
00060         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00061         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00062 
00063         // Reset Perspective Projection
00064         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00065         glPopMatrix();
00066         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00067         glPopMatrix();
00068 }

00070 void uiOptions::mouseUIOptions(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00071 {
00072         //KM 15/10/2016 click noise - sourced from http://soundbible.com/1705-Click2.html
00073         CEasySound *es;
00074         CSound* clickSound;
00075         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00076         clickSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/Click2-Sebastian-759472264.wav"));
00077 
00078         //temp vars that may need to be in gVar or similar
00079         //screen height and width centres
00080         int hc = height /2;
00081         int wc = width/2;
00082         int maxPlanets = 9;
00083         int numPlanets = 1;
00084         int minPlanets = 3;
00085         int maxProj = 20;
00086         int minProj = 1;
00087         int numProj = 15;
00088         
00089         //when click in pixel area of menu option make click sound and do expected action
00090         if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON && state == GLUT_UP)
00091         {
00092                 //will need to height-y to convert coords to match screen and mouse together
00093                 
00094                 std::cout << "x " << x << ", y " << y << std::endl;
00095                 //if coord range equals 
00096                 //increase planet number
00097                 if (x >= wc+20 && x <= wc+47 && y >= hc-29 && y <= hc-13)
00098                 {
00099                         clickSound->Play();
00100                         if (gVar.LevelNum != maxPlanets) {
00101                                 gVar.LevelNum+=3;
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104                 //decrease planet number
00105                 if (x >= wc + 20 && x <= wc+47 && y >= hc+5 && y <= hc+19)
00106                 {
00107                         clickSound->Play();
00108                         if (gVar.LevelNum != minPlanets) {
00109                                 gVar.LevelNum-=3;
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112                 //increase projectiles
00113                 if (x >= wc+18 && x <= wc+47 && y >= hc+49 && y <= hc+65)
00114                 {
00115                         clickSound->Play();
00116                         if (gVar.ballCount != maxProj) {
00117                                 gVar.ballCount++;
00118                         }
00119                 }
00120                 //decreate projectiles
00121                 if (x >= wc+19 && x <= wc+47 && y >= hc+84 && y <= hc+97)
00122                 {
00123                         clickSound->Play();
00124                         if (gVar.ballCount != minProj) {
00125                                 gVar.ballCount--;
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128                 //return to game
00129                 if (x >= wc+140 && x <= wc+236 && y >= hc+214 && y <= hc+235)
00130                 {
00131                         clickSound->Play();
00132                         gVar.uiOptions = false;
00133                         // reset and start timer, 
00134                         // reset all other game variables 
00135                         // restart animation
00136                 }
00137         }
00138 }
